title: Defamation like Jewish people
common: On this page we list families that were classified as Jewish to create persecution, or mistakes during researchs.
All families that had defamation as Jewish in São Paulo by Camargo's family during civil war (Taunay, Affonso d'E., 1953, 36-68) are identified with "(Pires X Camargo)".
The word defamation has a relationship with Inquisition times, and it should not be treated in the same way nowadays.

value.name: The Bettinck/Betting/Betim: (Pires X Camargo)
value.desc: described here are descendants of Gerhart Bettinck. It was not found defamation directly connected to him, but he had a marriage with a Fernandes woman, and his family received defamation in consequence.

value.name: The Dias (Pires X Camargo)
value.desc: of Lopo Dias did not have any defamation as Jewish, but a partial primary source was used to do him a Jewish in the 19th century.

value.name: The Fernandes: (Pires X Camargo)
value.desc: that we work here are descendants of Manuel Fernandes Ramos, that had the family declared Jewish by Francisco Camargo, "o tigre", but this was removed years later. He was again declared a Jewish person in the 19th century, when a partial primary source of a descendant was used to reach this goal.

value.name: The Leme:
value.desc: "became" Jewish when a false lineage was used to connect them to supposed Jewish people.

value.name: The Leme: (Pires X Camargo)
value.desc: "became" Jewish during a civil war, because Fernão Dias Paes had a marriage with a Betim.

value.name: The Rodrigues (Pires x Camargo)
value.desc: "became" a Jewish family of Gonçalo Rodrigues Velho, Custódia Dias's husband, for his actions during the Paulista civil war, after these events, research using a partial documentation of a descendant tried to do him a Jewish person again.

value.name: The Tavares - São Paulo
value.desc: "became" a Jewish family when Fernão Vieira Tavares' sister-in-law had a marriage with "Fulano Zurarte", that had fame to be Jewish.
